text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: So this is Japan's course……not bad.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: A country far to the east, "Japan". In that corner of the world, the strong foes that I seek――

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haaa……haaa……haaa……! Kuu……!!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: ……If I had messed up the timing on my attack ever so slightly, you would have likely made it to the goal first.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: A margin so paper-thin―― Up until now, I have never had a race so exhilarating.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: The existence of the strong, it makes me elated. El Condor Pasa, you are an opponent worthy of the title champion.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……In that case, if you go to Japan, then you'll be really thrilled.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Japan……?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It's not that I got this strong on my own. Because I had everyone, my rivals in Japan, I was able to become strong.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: If I'm worthy of the title champion, then in Japan there are many Uma Musume that are champions……!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: The excitement in my heart at that time, even now I can remember it vividly. And with that memory, every fiber of my being roils with excitement.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: ……keep me entertained, Uma Musume of Japan.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: This is the day that many fans have been waiting for! Where countless Uma Musume that have achieved results from across the world gather, the 『Japan Cup』!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: This year there are quite a few big names! Including Japan's, 4 Derby Uma Musume from across the world are here!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Among those, the most attention is given to the one who defeated El Condor Pasa at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, Montjeu!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: How will the Uma Musume of Japan stand up against her!? And then, the World's Strongest, just who will claim that title!?

text_block_list.name: Sociable Young Man
text_block_list.text: Who would have thought that Grass Wonder would withdraw……

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: It's true that if it was Grass Wonder it would have been a good match, however, it'll probably still be tough for Japan's Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: They rarely get a chance to experience the fierceness of those overseas―― and even Montjeu's there you know?

text_block_list.name: Sociable Young Man
text_block_list.text: Even if that's true, you still want Japan's Uma Musume to win, right?

text_block_list.name: Serious-looking Young Man
text_block_list.text: ……I'm praying for them, but reality is reality……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suu～.…… Haa～……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: As I thought, you're still a little nervous, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, rather than a little, I'd say a lot……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: As one of Japan's Uma Musume, the one with the most expectations is Special Week-san after all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: However, put another way, acknowledged as the Uma Musume in Japan with the most potential. It's something to be proud of.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah……!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Right, right, you've done all that you needed to! You've managed to lose all the weight you wanted to! You did it Spe, congrats!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-why do you know my weight!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And besides, in a little bit, a really reassuring ally will arrive!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ally……?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Speak of the devil.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ……I'm glad, it looks like I made it in time.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Eh? …………Eeeh!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san……!? Eh, why!? In America……!? Weren't you in America……!?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, I wanted to see Spe-chan's race in person.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaah～～! It's Suzuka-san! It's her, it's really her～!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It's been a while since Team <Sirius> has had everyone in one place!

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: It's because it's such a big stage, if we're going to cheer, it needs to be all of us!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
text_block_list.text: Everyone, let's cheer with all we've got!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, for the race today, famous Uma Musume from all across the world are gathered here.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Even with all those others there, just show us Spe-chan running impressively. That's everyone on the team's dream.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Everyone on the team's dream……
Show me that dream today too, Spe.
choice_data_list: Go run with all you've got!
Go run with all you've got!

text_block_list.text: Show me that dream today too, Spe.
choice_data_list: Go run with all you've got!
Go run with all you've got!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Heeey～, Spe-cha～n.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, Sei-chan! And everyone!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We came to cheer you on, Special Week-san. It seems like you're not feeling nervous.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well, she isn't King after all.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hold on! I don't really get nervous either!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, thanks for cheering, King-chan and Sei-chan too.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: They keep saying Japan's Uma Musume aren't up to it but, don't worry about that. If you run like normal, you'll definitely get results.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Seiun Sky-san is injured…… and to continue on my own path, I'm not participating, but――

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Do your best out there Spe-chan, enough for all of us!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: 『Satsuki Sho』, 『Japan Derby』, and then the 『Kikka Sho』…… when we ran the classic races, run with the same feeling from that time!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'll run enough for the both of you!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I admired Spe-chan's running, and because of that I'm able to run with more energy than I ever was before!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: That's why today too, that run you showed me at the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, do it so I'll want to chase after you even more!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Special Week-sama's run, has been engraved in to my heart this whole time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: 『Spring Tenno Sho』―― an Uma Musume that can run a race like that, one day I'll catch up, and eventually surpass it……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: And so, let me once again challenge you. After you've won against these world class Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Tsuru-chan and Bright-san too, I'll run so that you'll want to compete against me again!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Looks like you've got plenty of spirit, Spe-chan!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Yes, and she seems much more reliable than usual.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: El-chan, Grass-chan……!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Truthfully, I really want to get revenge for myself, but……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Got it Spe-chan? Don't lose to her!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: We believe in Spe-chan's victory.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: And then, in 『Arima Kinen』 we'll definitely have another match.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll definitely go win……!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Finally, those participating in the 『Japan Cup』 make their appearance on the turf!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Within Japan, the most popular, it's Special Week! This is the form of the "The Supreme Commander of Japan"!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Do your best～～～～! Spe-chaaaaaaaan!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume with Bangs
text_block_list.text: Spe-saaaan! Fight～～!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Do your best～～!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What's wrong, McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Nothing, when I saw Special Week-san, I guess I just remembered something……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice-san and Ticket-san, Brian-san and Suzuka-san too, that awe-inspiring feeling when watching your races, I think I feel that right now.
……it was the same with McQueen, too. That awe-inspiring feeling of showing me that you'll definitely take hold of your dream.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Taking hold of your dream……it seems like that's continued on to now. A trainer that thinks most about Uma Musume, and the feelings of the Uma Musume responding to that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: As a member of team <Sirius> running……show us you can take hold of that dream, Special Week-san.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Nice to meet you, Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Eh? Ah, nice to meet you!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: El Condor Pasa……your friend ran a truly unforgettable race.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: As much as the victory at the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, just running with her made me overjoyed, and my feelings towards Japan's Uma Musume changed.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Once more, I want to run in a race just like that. For that reason, now I'm standing here.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: For that reason, I hope you'll run in a way to grant my desire……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……I didn't think that even Montjeu-san would have such high expectations for me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Leave it to me, I'll live up to Montjeu-san's expectations and show you I can become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Let's have a good race, Montjeu-san……!

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Fufuu……

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: <Let's have a good race, Special Week>
